website_summaries.verdict: The monstrous Indoraptor is superbly detailed, easily runs alongside enthusiastic kids, and comes with more than enough features to entertain for hours.
pros: Push the ATV in front of Indoraptor, and the dinosaur chases it
cons: While batteries are included, it requires 6AAs

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old and he loves it. It does come in weird packaging and was basically shoved inside a bag inside a box. It comes turned on so anytime the box was jossled it made noises. We had to take it out of the box and attempt to locate the off switch so that way it didn't constantly go off. Unfortunately there is no off switch, but you can turn the volume down completely. So far it seems like a decent toy for the price. Not completely sure on the durability yet though since it was just opened
customer_reviews.author: Kat Rawline

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for any kid that loves vehicles and dinosaurs, my son has played with this daily and is excited seeing the dinosaur run after the ATV. Brings a lot of imagination to the kid when playing with this toy, it does really move faster when the ATV is moved faster in front of it. Good condition and got it fast
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected but pretty cool.
customer_reviews.text: In my mind I thought this would follow (chase) the car where ever it went. Which is sort of true as long as it's a straight line. It doesn't turn to follow. So it's good for short chases but loses some of the appeal if you go off center too much. I guess my imagination was expecting a bit more from it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Item as expected my son is going to love this, only thing I wish is that the dinosaur could come apart from the base.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie lively

customer_reviews.title: Great features
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy. When you race the suv in front of the Dino, he chases the suv. The faster and farther you go- the Dino matches. You can also twist the red stand on the Dino’s back to make him go or push it to make sounds. Very cool toy. A bit pricy but it is also unique. Hold up to my child on tile. Very entertaining for the right kid. Even my nieces wanted to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Audra Mabel

customer_reviews.title: Great for dino lovers
customer_reviews.text: The toy is real big.This was a gift for a four year old who is a big dinosaur fan . The kid loved the gift , they even sent me a video of him playing with it and thanking us telling it’s the best gift of all he got . Just a little suggestion, if you are buying this thing for gift, do get the box amazon suggests to put in ,as the original box of this toy is very much opened and you will find it difficult to wrap gift .
customer_reviews.author: Hassan A.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for your dinosaur lover
customer_reviews.text: This toy is amazing! I gifted this for a 5 year old Boy...and he absolutely loved it. I watched him play with it, and I was honestly so impressed with how cool it was. He loved it, this 30 year old loved it-and it didn’t break the bank. Win win.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this gift, it's a bit more expensive than other things but well worth the money! The light on the little car guides the dinosaur to follow it. It's big and sturdy, makes noises and goes at a decent speed! My grandson absolutely loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Murray

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo son got this for Christmas, he loves it! Some reviewers didn’t like that the dinosaur doesn’t come off the base but that has not been a problem for us! The base makes it easy for my son to move it and allows it to stand easily on many surfaces, like the couch. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: Great toy hrs of fun
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson loved his gift he said it was best gift ever so was huge hit at Christmas I did not get pic to post as he’s gone home n my 3 yr old grandson played with my phone n deleted all my pics somewhere lol
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift, so I don't know how well I works
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: As expected.Sons going to really like it.
customer_reviews.text: Imaginext toys are my sons favorite.He will be getting this for Christmas.All around as expected.
customer_reviews.author: James and Ashley V.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, interactive toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this toy! And because he moves the car that the Dino follows, he remains active and isn’t just sitting around. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids like it! They got this toy for Christmas and they still play with it daily 8 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry B. Collison

customer_reviews.title: Buy it ...its a pleaser for sure
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Chistmas for my 4 1/2 yr. Old ...he loves it....good quality product and just what a dino lover needs in his collection
customer_reviews.author: k.gamb

customer_reviews.title: Like any toy
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old loved it for about 5mins, lol. He played more with the guy on the ATV. Parents if you have raised door frames be mindful that the dinosaur will need help getting over them. I mean it did what it was supposed to do.He played with it and had fun.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat82

customer_reviews.title: Cool Moving, Roaring Dino Toy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 2 year old as a Christmas gift that he wanted, and he really likes the roaring sounds and the look of it. He doesn’t know what to think yet about the sensor-follow feature that the Dino does when the car is in front of it. It works great and still using the batteries it came with!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thomas Stuhl

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My son (4) loves this product. He wanted a robot dinosaur for Christmas and this met those requirements as far as he is concerned. Very neat concept the dinosaur will chase the car but it has to be in a straight line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my 3 year old and he loved it, it’s easy to use for small kids and a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Bebis

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaurs their not just for kids
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved this, dinosaur chases after the ATV. Very fun (for me too)
customer_reviews.author: Richco

customer_reviews.title: my son loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is awesome!!!!! My son absolutely loves it!!! He loves the movement and sounds and he really gets so much joy from it. Very well made!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dbrepeater

customer_reviews.title: Good toy.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it. It chases the man on the four wheeler. Goes on short carpet also.

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Five-year-old grandson loves it, it’s so awesome how the dinosaur follows the car
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this toy to my great grandson for Christmas. He love it!! Told me it was just what he wanted. I haven't heard how much it's been played with yet but the joy on his face when he opened it was enough to give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Maines

customer_reviews.title: Grandson's favorite
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson really, really loved this gift. He had to unwrap it and start playing right away. Everyone in the family (15 of us) enjoyed it too. Loved that it chased the man.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: my 3 yr old son is enjoying this very much.
customer_reviews.author: LA Mom

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: My little nephew loves this and can't stop playing with it! He is a huge Jurassic Park fan! He is 5.

customer_reviews.title: Just what he asked Santa for
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was thrilled with this. It’s an awesome dinosaur how it chase after the 4 wheeler
customer_reviews.author: Peggy T C

customer_reviews.title: Missing Man
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and both appear in great condition except one is missing the Imaginext Man on the top left corner. I will be returning it and ordering once more in hopes of receiving all the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Candace C Karpakis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked with no problems, my grandson loved playing with it whenever his dad would give him a turn lol.

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This toy does not follow the Jeep everywhere. It only goes in straight lines forward.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Dinosaur enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.text: My 5yr old has enjoyed this gift. Great for any child who enjoys dinosaurs and/or Jurrasic Park/World.
customer_reviews.author: Real Human Bean,paying Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it, and he still plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Zeno

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. It’s a nice large toy that won’t get lost amidst all his other toys lol. Got it for a great price.

customer_reviews.title: great present
customer_reviews.text: gave it to my son for christmas and he loves it. it's nice and sturdy and can take a hit now and then from the other dinosaurs (my sons words)

customer_reviews.title: Walks are short....
customer_reviews.text: Cool toy! Was disappointed in the walking feature. It only walks about 4 inches at a time.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So fun my 4yr old and 9 yr old love it.

customer_reviews.title: Not as entertaining as hoped
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 and loves dinosaurs, but this did not keep his attention

customer_reviews.title: Very funny toy
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than we thought. The eyes are very cool and the sounds are realistic! The thing that would make it better is if it was removable from the base.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: Great REX!
customer_reviews.text: If your kid likes Dynos this is a great addition. Noise and movement keeps them playing all day.

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds and movement
customer_reviews.text: Got on sale, great price. Dinosaur "chases" vehicle when in close enough proximity. Can also move by twisting the top standing platform. My Boys love it.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dino lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, and easy to use. Bought this for my 3 year old grandson’s birthday. He loved playing with it!

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his toy. Thank u so much, it was on time and exactly what I expected!

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought the toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toy for my son and he really likes playing with the dinosaur; he can be rough so it has definitely lasted a long time

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for kids 2yrs +
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my almost 3yr old son and he loves it!! He loves that the dinosaur will chase the 4wheeler and he has so much fun with this toy! Worth every penny!

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Dino doesn’t turn w the Jeep when following. It only goes straight. Otherwise it’s fun.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, holds up to a rough toddler !
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old loves it , Purchased for Christmas gift .

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids

customer_reviews.title: This is so cool! And I got a really good deal on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool! And I got a really good deal on it. My son plays with this ALL The time!!

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool toy! We are big fans of Jurassic World and Imaginext! They did a fantastic job!

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is very good toy for kids. My kid like this toy very much. Giving 4 starts as I am expecting toy to take turn but it follows straight path. I will recommend this toy.

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Imaginext Jurassic World Walking Indoraptor
product_meta.description: What’s that booming sound It’s the ferocious Jurassic World Walking Indoraptor—it’s on the loose! With the turn of the Power Pad, kids can send the angry dinosaur stomping forward on its own. Place Owen in the ATV and send him racing into action! Roll the ATV in front of the dinosaur to provoke it into chase mode—the faster the vehicle rolls, the faster the Walking Indoraptor will chase! Can Owen get this dangerous dinosaur under control That’s for your young adventurer to decide! Imaginext Imagine What’s Next!
feature_bullets: Roll the ATV in front of the Walking Indoraptor dinosaur to see it chase after Owen!
Turn the Power Pad to send the dinosaur stomping forward
Walking Indoraptor has two stomping speeds: Walk along or rushing speed
RAWR! Push the Power Pad to open its mouth
For preschool kids ages 3-8 years. Includes Walking Indoraptor, ATV, and Owen figure

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
